languages.text:
{n}Арлекин недобро смеется, словно вы сказали какую-то наивную глупость.{/n}
"Ты состраданьем наделяешь маску.
На сцене нет желаний – только роли.
Твоя роль — прорываться сквозь преграды,
Моя же — мелом помечать впотьмах
Места артистов, их ведя к развязке".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Арлекин недобро смеется, словно вы сказали какую-то наивную глупость.{/n}
"Ты состраданьем наделяешь маску.
На сцене нет желаний – только роли.
Твоя роль — прорываться сквозь преграды,
Моя же — мелом помечать впотьмах
Места артистов, их ведя к развязке".
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}The Harlequin laughs darkly as if you have uttered some naive inanity.{/n}
"In vain you grant compassion to the mask,
Though you and I play roles, desire has none.
Your part on stage — to break through barricades,
While mine's to chalk in darkness players' marks,
And lead the company to its finale."
languages.original_text:
{n}Арлекин недобро смеется, словно вы сказали какую-то наивную глупость.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}丑角发出了阴暗的大笑，仿佛你说的话全都是天真的无稽之谈。{/n}
“你对面具的怜悯徒劳无功，
你我都在扮演角色，不受欲望所控。
你的角色，在舞台上演出这一场好戏，
我的角色，在黑暗中画下演员的印记，
带领这场好戏走向终局。”
languages.original_text:
{n}The Harlequin laughs darkly as if you have uttered some naive inanity.{/n}
"In vain you grant compassion to the mask,
Though you and I play roles, desire has none.
Your part on stage — to break through barricades,
While mine's to chalk in darkness players' marks,
And lead the company to its finale."

traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}El Arlequín emite una risa tétrica, como si hubieras dicho algo ingenuo y ridículo.{/n}
«En vano proyectas sobre la máscara compasión:
aunque tú y yo tenemos un papel, carece de todo deseo.
En el escenario, debes en las barricadas sembrar destrucción,
mientras yo dibujo en las sombras las marcas de los maestros
y guío a esta compañía hacia el final de la actuación».
languages.original_text:
{n}The Harlequin laughs darkly as if you have uttered some naive inanity.{/n}
"In vain you grant compassion to the mask,
Though you and I play roles, desire has none.
Your part on stage — to break through barricades,
While mine's to chalk in darkness players' marks,
And lead the company to its finale."

traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}ハーレクィンは無知な戯言を聞いたかのように陰気に笑う。{/n}
「仮面に思いやりを求めても無駄
君も僕も与えられた役を演じるだけ
君は舞台で防柵を突破し
僕は暗闇の中で演者の痕跡を刻み
全員をフィナーレへと導こう」
languages.original_text:
{n}The Harlequin laughs darkly as if you have uttered some naive inanity.{/n}
"In vain you grant compassion to the mask,
Though you and I play roles, desire has none.
Your part on stage — to break through barricades,
While mine's to chalk in darkness players' marks,
And lead the company to its finale."

traits.locale_text:
{n}ハーレクィンは無知な戯言を聞いたかのように陰気に笑う。{/n}
「仮面に思いやりを求めても無駄
君も僕も与えられた役を演じるだけ
君は舞台で防柵を突破し
僕は暗闇の中で演者の痕跡を刻み
全員をフィナーレへと導こう」
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}Der Harlekin lacht düster, als hättest du etwas ungeheuer Naives und Dummes von dir gegeben.{/n}
"Vergebens die Maske Ihr Mitleid lehrt.
Wir zwei spielen Rollen; die Lust, die nicht.
Euer Part: Barrikaden zu zerstören.
Der meine: Aus dem Dunkel zu leiten
und alle Spieler zum Finale führ'n."
languages.original_text:
{n}The Harlequin laughs darkly as if you have uttered some naive inanity.{/n}
"In vain you grant compassion to the mask,
Though you and I play roles, desire has none.
Your part on stage — to break through barricades,
While mine's to chalk in darkness players' marks,
And lead the company to its finale."

und alle Spieler zum Finale führ'n."
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}L'Arlequin éclate d'un rire sombre, comme si vous veniez de prononcer la plus naïve des inepties.{/n}
« En vain, vous accordez au masque des sentiments.
Si vous et moi jouons un rôle, le désir n'en tient aucun.
Vous êtes sur scène pour réduire les obstacles à néant,
Tandis que dans l'ombre, je dirige les comédiens
Afin de conduire la troupe à un final cohérent. »
languages.original_text:
{n}The Harlequin laughs darkly as if you have uttered some naive inanity.{/n}
"In vain you grant compassion to the mask,
Though you and I play roles, desire has none.
Your part on stage — to break through barricades,
While mine's to chalk in darkness players' marks,
And lead the company to its finale."

traits.locale_text:
{n}L'arlequin éclate d'un rire sombre, comme si vous veniez de prononcer la plus naïve des inepties.{/n}
« En vain, vous accordez au masque des sentiments.
Si vous et moi jouons un rôle, le désir n'en tient aucun.
Vous êtes sur scène pour réduire les obstacles à néant,
Tandis que dans l'ombre, je dirige les comédiens
Afin de conduire la troupe à un final cohérent. »
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}Arleken, tüm saflığınla anlamsız sözler gevelemişsin gibi esrarengiz bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n}
"Maskeye bahşettiğin merhamet beyhude,
Rollerimizi oynasak da arzu yok hiçbirinde.
Senin sahnede alacağın roldür barikatları aşmak,
Benimkiyse sıradaki oyunculara karanlıkta ışık tutmak.
En nihayetinde görevimdir yoldaşlarını finale taşımak."
languages.original_text:
{n}The Harlequin laughs darkly as if you have uttered some naive inanity.{/n}
"In vain you grant compassion to the mask,
Though you and I play roles, desire has none.

And lead the company to its finale."
